title: Personal feedback
body:
1) The new accept circle for accepting a queue makes it feel like the time to accept is much shorter, because it looks like the time-remaining bar moves much quicker, not sure if on purpose

2) Editing masteries takes much longer, as clicking the desired mastery too fast will not accept the input, meaning you have to wait a second between each click, so changing them takes much longer.

3) Bug: A while ago I got a key fragment, and then closed the client. Ever since, upon opening the client, it gives me the "you have earned a key fragment" notice, even though I've already combined it into a full key and used it

4) It would be nice to see the champions a friend has available, so I could suggest to my new friends who they should play

5) Skin selection could use some work, should show what skins are owned first, maybe have multiple rows for easier viewing

6) Not sure if due to the client, but my settings reset every time I get in game.

replies.body:
Colinmonox, great feedback! 

Love to hear a bit more about some of the issues you're seeing if you have a moment.

1-2.)  I think some changes are in the works for next patch for masteries that may address some of the issues you'll see above.

3.) This key fragment bug has been the bane of our existence -- fortunately, I also believe the fix is in for the next patch. Hopefully you'll never see that persistent, pesky, fragment outside of when you actually earn it...again.

4-5.) Cool suggestions, makes sense--especially for new players.

6.) Super concerning.  Do you know when the last time this happened to you was?  This should be fixed as of yesterday, but if it's still occurring we'd like to see specifically what is going on.

Thanks for being awesome!

hey, will you allow the players to add bots in custom games soon?

Hey colinmonox,

This is really great feedback, and I'll certainly pass it along. Thanks for taking the time to help make the client better!

Maybe I'm boosted, but is there an item sets tab? Like the option to set up characters builds? If I am wrong and there is a tab then disregard, but i think an entire tab dedicated to viewing summoner spells, and no tab for item sets wasn't the best choice. Please correct me if i'm wrong.

While this personal feedback thread is open, I'd love to ask something!
I know there has to be a community of people who wear glasses (like me) and so far I'm digging the new lay out of things but text and buttons seem to be much smaller on this client. If there was any way to make the window size on the home page setup a little bigger or personalize the size of the window to a user's liking that would be awesome. I'm finding myself squinting a lot more and having a harder time reading this alpha client...I hope it's not just a personal problem for me {{item:3070}}  and that other's are possibly experiencing the same issue.
Thanks!
